Verses: 1 karththar Thaam Solliyirundhapadi Saaraalperil Kadaatchamaanaar; Karththar Thaam Uraiththapadiye Saaraalukku Seydharulinaar.
2 aabiragaam Mudhirvayadhaayirukkaiyil, Saaraal Garppavadhiyaagi, Dhevan Kuriththirundha Kaalaththile Avanukku Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal.
3 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Thanakku Saaraal Petra Kumaaranukku Eesaakku Endru Perittaan.
4 than Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakku Pirandha Ettaam Naalile, Aabiragaam Thanakku Dhevan Kattalaiyittirundhapadi Avanukku Viruththasedhanampanninaan.
5 than Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakku Pirandhapodhu Aabiragaam Nooru Vayadhaayirundhaan.
6 appozhudhu Saaraal: Dhevan Ennai Nagaikkappanninaar; Idhaik Ketkira Yaavarum Ennodekooda Nagaippaargal.
7 saaraal Pillaigalukkup Paal Koduppaal Endru Aabiragaamukku Evan Solluvaan? Avarudaiya Mudhirvayadhile Avarukku Oru Kumaaranaip Petrene Endraal.
8 pillai Valarndhu, Paal Marandhadhu; Eesaakku Paal Marandhanaalile Aabiragaam Periya Virundhupanninaan.
9 pinbu Egipthu Dhesaththaalaagiya Aagaar Aabiragaamukkup Petra Kumaaran Pariyaasampannugiradhai Saaraal Kandu,
10 aabiragaamai Nokki: Indha Adimaip Pennaiyum Aval Maganaiyum Purambe Thallum; Indha Adimaip Pennin Magan En Kumaaranaagiya Eesaakkode Sudhandharavaaliyaayiruppadhillai Endraal.
11 than Maganaikkuriththu Sollappatta Indhak Kaariyam Aabiragaamukku Migavum Dhukkamaayirundhadhu.

12 appozhudhu Dhevan Aabiragaamai Nokki: Andhap Pillaiyaiyum, Un Adimaippennaiyum Kuriththu Sollappattadhu Unakku Dhukkamaayirukka Vendaam; Eesaakkinidaththil Un Sandhadhi Vilangum; Aadhalaal Saaraal Unakku Solvadhellaavatraiyum Kel.
13 adimaippennin Maganum Un Viththaayirukkirapadiyaal, Avanaiyum Oru Jaadhiyaakkuven Endraar.

14 aabiragaam Adhikaalaiyil Ezhundhu, Appaththaiyum Oru Thuruththi Thanneeraiyum Eduththu, Aagaarudaiya Tholinmel Vaiththup Pillaiyaiyum Oppukkoduththu, Avalai Anuppivittaan; Aval Purappattuppoi, Peyersebaavin Vanaandharaththile Alaindhu Thirindhaal.
15 thuruththiyilirundha Thanneer Selavazhindhapinbu, Aval Pillaiyai Oru Chediyinkeezhe Vittu,
16 pillai Saagiradhai Naan Paarkkamaatten Endru, Edhiraaga Ambu Paayum Thooraththile Poi Utkaarndhu Saththamittu Azhudhaal.

17 dhevan Pillaiyin Saththaththaik Kettaar; Dhevathoodhan Vaanaththilirundhu Aagaaraik Kooppittu: Aagaare, Unakku Enna Sambaviththadhu, Bayappadaadhe, Pillaiyirukkum Idaththile Dhevan Avan Saththaththaik Kettaar.
18 nee Ezhundhu Pillaiyai Eduththu Avanai Un Kaiyinaal Pidiththukkondupo, Avanaip Periya Jaadhiyaakkuven Endraar.
19 dhevan Avaludaiya Kangalaith Thirandhaar; Appozhudhu Aval Oru Thanneerth Thuravaik Kandu, Poi, Thuruththiyile Thanneer Nirappi, Pillaikkuk Kudikkak Koduththaal.
20 dhevan Pillaiyudane Irundhaar; Avan Valarndhu Vanaandharaththile Kudiyirundhu, Vilviththaiyile Vallavanaanaan.
21 avan Paaraan Vanaandharaththile Kudiyirukkaiyil, Avanudaiya Thaai Egipthu Dhesaththaalaagiya Oru Pennai Avanukku Vivaagampannuviththaal.
22 akkaalaththil Abimelekkum Avan Senaapadhiyaagiya Pikolum Aabiragaamai Nokki: Nee Seygira Kaariyangal Ellaavatrilum Dhevan Unnudane Irukkiraar.

23 aagaiyaal, Nee Enakkaavadhu, En Kumaaranukkaavadhu, En Peranukkaavadhu Vanjanai Seyyaamal, Naan Unakku Seydha Dhayavinpadiye, Nee Enakkum, Nee Thangiyirukkira Indha Dhesaththirkum, Dhayavu Seyven Endru Inge Dhevan Peril Enakku Aanaiyittukkodu Endraan.
24 adharku Aabiragaam: Naan Aanaiyittukkodukkiren Endraan.
25 aanaalum, Abimelekkudaiya Velaikkaarar Kaivasappaduththikkonda Thuravin Nimiththam Aabiragaam Abimelekkaik Kadindhukondaan.

26 adharku Abimelekku: Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydhavan Innaan Endru Enakkuth Theriyaadhu, Neeyum Enakku Arivikkavillai; Indru Naan Adhaik Kettadheyandri, Idharkumun Adhai Naan Kelvippattadhe Illai Endraan.
27 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Aadumaadugalaik Konduvandhu Abimelekkukkuk Koduththaan; Avargal Iruvarum Udanpadikkai Pannikkondaargal.
28 aabiragaam Ezhu Pennaattukkuttigalaith Thaniye Niruththinaan.
29 appozhudhu Abimelekku Aabiragaamai Nokki: Nee Thaniye Niruththina Indha Ezhu Pennaattukkuttigal Ennaththirku Endru Kettaan.
30 adharku Avan: Naan Indhath Thuravu Thondinadhaikkuriththu, Neer Saatchiyaaga Indha Ezhu Pennaattukkuttigalai En Kaiyil Vaangikkollavendum Endraan.
31 avargal Iruvarum Avvidaththil Aanaiyittukkondapadiyaal, Andha Idam Peyersebaa Ennappattadhu.
32 avargal Peyersebaavile Udanpadikkai Pannikkondapin Abimelekkum, Avan Senaapadhiyaagiya Pikolum Ezhundhu Pelistharudaiya Dhesaththirkuth Thirumbipponaargal.
33 aabiragaam Peyersebaavile Oru Thoppai Undaakki, Sadhaakaalamumulla Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththai Avvidaththil Thozhudhukondaan.
34 aabiragaam Pelistharudaiya Dhesaththil Anega Naal Thangiyirundhaan.
